name: C-clamp
description: The C-clamp is a versatile clamping tool used in woodworking to hold pieces of wood together securely during glue-ups or while working on projects. It features a 'C' shaped frame with a screw mechanism that allows the user to adjust the width and tighten the clamp for a firm grip. C-clamps are essential for ensuring accuracy and stability in joinery and assembly tasks.
